plot: Rick hooks up the family's TV with interdimensional cable, allowing them to watch infinite TV from across the multiverse.

When Rick hooks up the family's tv receiver with reality-tv shows from alternate dimensions, and allows them to see themselves in different versions of their lives, they begin to wonder what they have, and more importantly - what could have been.—NemesisQ

Rick hacks the family's cable box so he can watch TV from different planets and dimensions across the universe with his grandon. Meanwhile, the rest of the family is more interested in a VR-style headset that shows them what could've been with their lives by offering them persepectives of how their interdimensional counterparts live.
